short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool dedicated to improving the efficiency of web tab operations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Tool helps people manipulate pages and tabs more easily when using a browser.
You can copy links to pages without manipulating the address bar, and you can copy page links without switching to the corresponding page.
When you want to share multiple page links to your coworkers, multi-select them and copy them to the clipboard with one click.
